fields.name: Number of Forum Access
fields.code:
# def_num of mod_forum in logstore for one user

from administration.models import Course
from django.db import connections

dict_result = []

with connections['moodle'].cursor() as cursor:
    query_string = "SELECT userid FROM m_logstore_standard_log where component = 'mod_forum' and courseid = %s and userid = %s"
    for course in course_qs:
      users = course.get_users_for_assessment()
      for user in users:
        cursor.execute(query_string, (course.id, user))
        value = len(cursor.fetchall())
        dict_result.append({'courseid': course.id, 'userid': user, 'value': value})
